@@ -11,7 +11,13 @@
 
    @XFLEET-2411
    Scenario: reaching the all activities by using Newer and Older buttons
-    Then the user click "Older" and "Newer" buttons to change the pages
+     Then the user should be able to see newer activity
+    Then the user clicks "Newer" button
+     And the user verifies newer button is not clickable
+     Then the user clicks "Older" button
+     And the user should be able to see older activity
+
+
 
    @XFLEET-2412
    Scenario: changing page number for getting following attachment informations
@@ -20,12 +26,14 @@
     Then the user verifies "2" is displayed on input-widget
 
    @XFLEET-2413
-   Scenario Outline: changing the entity number by clicking the View Per Page dropdown(10,25,50,100
-    Then the user clicks "<dropdown-item>" and "<index>"
+   Scenario Outline: changing the entity number by clicking the View Per Page dropdown(10,25,50,100)
+     And the user clicks "btn-group open" dropdown
+    Then the user selects "<dropdown-item>" number
+     And the user should be able to see "<dropdown-item>" in the view per page
 
     Examples:
-      |dropdown-item|index|
-      |10           |1    |
-      |25           |2    |
-      |50           |3    |
-      |100          |4    |
\ No newline at end of file
+      |dropdown-item|
+      |10           |
+      |25           |
+      |50           |
+      |100          |
\ No newline at end of file
